sentence.text: Glycine cleavage system (GCS) catalyzes the degradation of glycine and disruption of its components encoded by glycine catabolic process, AMT and GCSH are the only known causes of glycine encephalopathy, also known as non-ketotic hyperglycinemia (glycine decarboxylation via glycine cleavage system).

entity.text: glycine decarboxylation via glycine cleavage system
